mcp-n8n-stable.comment: STABLE: Uses published package from PyPI (for production use)

mcp-n8n-dev.comment: DEV: Uses local editable install (pip install -e) for development

usage: Copy this file to ~/.cursor/mcp.json (or your Cursor config location)
Enable ONLY ONE server at a time:
- For stable: keep mcp-n8n-stable, remove or comment mcp-n8n-dev
- For dev: keep mcp-n8n-dev, remove or comment mcp-n8n-stable

paths.update_paths: Update all paths to match your system:

toggle_to_dev: 1. Ensure dev install: cd /path/to/mcp-n8n && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -e .[dev]
4. Update paths to match your system
_instructions.verification: Test with Cursor's MCP inspector or by making a tool call
